title: ELISEO GARCIA Of ABYSMAL DAWN on Iron Never Lies Season 2
description: Brandon trains with Eliseo Garcia of Abysmal Dawn and discuss how he got into bass playing, the story about how he entered Abysmal Dawn, being pigeon holed into death metal, […] The post ELISEO GARCIA Of ABYSMAL DAWN on Iron Never Lies Season 2 appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Metal Injection
byline: By Metal Injection Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: Brandon trains with Eliseo Garcia of Abysmal Dawn and discuss how he got into bass playing, the story about how he entered Abysmal Dawn, being pigeon holed into death metal, why he plays and what it means to him, his gateway albums into death metal, how he got into weight lifting, what he’s listenin
text: Brandon trains with Eliseo Garcia of Abysmal Dawn and discuss how he got into bass playing, the story about how he entered Abysmal Dawn, being pigeon holed into death metal, why he plays and what it means to him, his gateway albums into death metal, how he got into weight lifting, what he’s listening to these days, what is coming up with Abysmal Dawn and so much more! html:
Brandon trains with Eliseo Garcia of Abysmal Dawn and discuss how he got into bass playing, the story about how he entered Abysmal Dawn, being pigeon holed into death metal, why he plays and what it means to him, his gateway albums into death metal, how he got into weight lifting, what he’s listening to these days, what is coming up with Abysmal Dawn and so much more!
